TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ALSource3f extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: A list of valid Math.Vector3 Source/GetSource parameters

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSource3f Direction = int32(4101)
.field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSource3f Position = int32(4100)

Docs.summary: Specify the current location in three dimensional space. OpenAL, like OpenGL, uses a right handed coordinate system, where in a frontal default view X (thumb) points right, Y points up (index finger), and Z points towards the viewer/camera (middle finger). To switch from a left handed coordinate system, flip the sign on the Z coordinate. Listener position is always in the world coordinate system.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSource3f Velocity = int32(4102)

Docs.summary: Specify the current velocity in three dimensional space.
